alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Stanley; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:59AM MDT until June 14 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sully County in central South Dakota... North central Stanley County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Dewey County in north central South Dakota... * Until 245 AM CDT/145 AM MDT/. * At 158 AM CDT/1258 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Mission Ridge, or 23 miles southeast of Eagle Butte, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sully, north central Stanley and southeastern Dewey Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
